message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you.  I'm asking for $15,000. What are your thoughts?
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $12,000 is a tempting offer, I believe the value of this product is closer to my original price.  Would you consider $13,500?
I'm getting closer to your price, but I'm still not quite there. I'd be willing to meet you at $12,500. Would you be willing to sell the product to me for that price?
